Description: PROBLEM: Most teams fail due to bad Git hygiene - direct pushes to main, missing code reviews, no CI gates. APPROACH: Adopt Trunk-Based Development with 3 separate repos (Infra/App/GitOps).
Create techitfactory-infra (Terraform), techitfactory-app (Microservices), techitfactory-gitops (ArgoCD manifests). Each repo needs README with prerequisites.
Configure GitHub branch protections: main protected, PR required, no direct push. Add CODEOWNERS file.
PROBLEM: Two engineers running terraform apply can corrupt state. AWS keys in GitHub = security risk. APPROACH: Remote state in S3 + GitHub OIDC.
Create Terraform for S3 bucket (versioned), DynamoDB table (locking), KMS key. Must be idempotent.
Create AWS IAM OIDC provider for GitHub. No static AWS keys anywhere.
Create modules/vpc, modules/eks. CI runs terraform fmt + validate.
PROBLEM: Poor VPC design wastes money. NAT per AZ = $96/month wasted. APPROACH: Single NAT + S3 endpoint.
Create VPC in ap-south-1 with 2 AZs. Single NAT gateway (cost optimization).
Add S3 Gateway endpoint. Document cost savings.
PROBLEM: Self-managed K8s requires too much overhead. APPROACH: EKS + IRSA for pod-level IAM.
Create EKS via Terraform with version pinning. Enable Managed Node Group.
Map AWS SSO role to K8s RBAC. No static AWS keys for humans.
Deploy Cluster Autoscaler with IRSA. Test scale-out/in.
Install metrics-server, EBS CSI driver via Terraform.
PROBLEM: K8s Services are internal. Need HTTPS + custom domain. APPROACH: ALB Controller + ACM + Route53.
Deploy AWS LB Controller. Verify Ingress creates ALB.
ACM cert for techitfactory.com. Route53 A record. Verify HTTPS works.
PROBLEM: Manual kubectl is unauditable. APPROACH: GitOps with ArgoCD. App-of-Apps pattern.
Install ArgoCD via Helm. Expose UI via ingress.
Create root Application pointing to GitOps repo. Child apps auto-sync.
Create namespaces and Argo Projects with blast-radius control.
PROBLEM: Need metrics, logs, dashboards. APPROACH: PLG stack (Prometheus, Loki, Grafana).
Deploy via GitOps. Expose Grafana via ingress.
Deploy Loki. Configure Grafana datasource.
PROBLEM: Platform is empty. APPROACH: 4 polyglot services - /health, /ready, non-root Docker, Helm.
Create /services/frontend, product, cart, order with health endpoints.
Multi-stage, non-root, <100MB images.
Deployment + Service + probes for each service.
Ingress routes for frontend and APIs. Smoke test.
PROBLEM: Manual build doesn't scale. APPROACH: GitHub Actions + SonarCloud + Trivy + GitOps.
Workflows for lint, test, Trivy scan, DockerHub push.
Quality gates in PR. Document policy.
Merge to main updates GitOps repo. ArgoCD auto-syncs.
GitHub Release triggers prod deployment.
PROBLEM: AWS costs add up. APPROACH: One-command make up/down. <20 min target.
Idempotent scripts for full platform lifecycle.
Time each stage. Document optimization levers.
